Text.Page:
We're still unpacking from the move, and we don't have all our reference materials yet.

Can you borrow a thaumaturgical book from the Collegium Arcane? They'll understand... professional courtesy and all that.
This may be the book that Fitae wants.

Exactly what I needed. Thank you, .

Your help is getting us up to speed on our research quickly.
The book is in Collegium Arcane. Sorry, no pictures. It's a grown-up book.
